DataListSpec.Name: Constituent Pictures Data List
DataListSpec.Description: A data list showing constituent pictures records.
DataListSpec.Author: IUF Development

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CONSTITUENTPICTURES as set nocount on;
select distinct ID as CONSTITUENTID, FORMATTEDNAME as NAME, PICTURE from V_QUERY_CONSTITUENT where ISINDIVIDUAL = 1 and ISINACTIVE = 0 and PICTURE is not null
